EU fines Google $3.5B over adtech ‘abuse’
item.description: This is the EU's largest antitrust penalty ever — and Trump has already threatened to "nullify" it.

item.title: The growing debate over expanding age verification laws
item.description: As age and identity verification laws become more mainstream, this legislation could have a dire impact on privacy.

item.title: OpenAI reorganizes research team behind ChatGPT’s personality
item.description: OpenAI is shuffling the team that shapes its AI models' behavior, and its leader is moving on to another project within the company.
